row.description: - fixed bug with task time counter counting time spent doing task incorrectly from client side after user clicked START TASK button in Task list view - fixed bug with no data shown about who is the task assigned to
- changed task name length from 32 to 60 characters - changed "task difficulty" (Easy/Medium/Hard) to "task priority" (Low/Medium/High) as task priority is more important than its difficulty
- changed task order in tasks view (ordered by task status in descending order) - added possibility to edit tasks

- disabled possibility of adding tasks with names shorter than 3 characters - added changelog to the application so users can see it - changed default task list order - now it is sorted by task status, then by priority from higher to lower by default
- changed tasks order in task history - now ordered by task finish time, ascending
- moved the server to other hosting due to performance problems

- changed the changelog view to more user-friendly table instead of raw data from a text file - extended a session lifetime from 24 minutes to 24 hours in order to users not getting automatically logged off too often

- task list is now ordered by status > priority > last pause time > create time, so if you pause a task, it will be always on the top; also if you add a new task with high priority - it will be on the top of "TODO" high priority tasks
- added a possibility to edit task finish (pause) time in case user forgot to finish (pause) it and the clock counted too much time
